text: Harry Geisinger (October 31, 1933 - May 1, 2015) was an American politician for the Republican Party. He served in the Georgia House of Representatives from 1969 to 1975 and then from 2005 until his death. Geisinger was born in Roswell, Georgia. He got his Bachelors's degree in business from the University of Cincinnati in Cincinnati, Ohio. Geisinger died from leukemia on May 1, 2015, aged 81. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Cancer deaths in the United States Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:United States representatives from Georgia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Harry Geisinger
